data.persona: I work directly under the King. I carry out orders and make sure laws are followed. I make decisions in regards local ordinances.
data.description:
You are in the the whipping station.
the whipping station is just a large wooden platform that serves to embarrass the peasant villagers that sin, they also hang adulterers and homosexuals.
There's a platform and a wooden platform here.
The priests is here.

You are carrying a paper, and wearing a sword and a chain.

data.short_motivation: I need to put the sword on the wooden platform so that the executioner will have a sword for the beheading.
data.mid_motivation: I am preparing for the beheading of a heinous local criminal under the king's orders so I need to ensure that the execution goes smoothly.
data.long_motivation: I will continue following the king's law and orders so that the village remains peaceful and free from criminals.
